To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Depth Charge arrives
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Speedbreaker, now relieved of his rider, transforms, and stops his decent
into the pit, quikly swinging around the bomb Angel Prime launched at them,
as he rises into the air. The bomb detonates in the abiss (Prodigey, im not
sure if you wanted to say it detonates, so tell me, and this post will be
invalid) and the flames lick at Speedbreaker's body, the force of the
explosion sending him upwards, and lighting him on fire. "No no no" He
shouts as he gains enough altitude, and grabs for Killfest, noticing the
jetpacks dwindeling fuel.
